item.title: Why I replaced Notezilla with Taskpaper
item.description:
Notezilla although versatile has a few issues:

  1. The app depends on proprietary methods to store notes.
  2. The syncing feature doesn’t work very well.
Taskpaper allows:
  • It uses a flat file structure
  • In has built in features that allow you to set tasks based on tags.
  • You can use Dropbox to handle the task files.
